title: How Big Tech became such a big target on Capitol Hill
text: It wasn't long ago that the tech titans of today were aggressive upstarts setting out to make our lives easier. What happened?

title: 'Near-perfect market intelligence': Why a House report says Big Tech monopolies are uniquely powerful
text: The biggest finding from this week's House antitrust report on Big Tech isn't that Amazon, Apple, Google and Facebook are monopolies. Believe it or not, monopolies are actually legal under current US law.
